issue.title: Current Sensor_TEST fails without a display

content.raw:
I've looked into this a little bit. It appears that the Sensor_TEST.ResetWorldStressTest is failing with or without a Display ([see gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-ati build 139](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-ati/139/testReport/(root)/Sensor_TEST/test_ran/)).

With some debugging of Sensor_TEST.ResetWorldStressTest, I've noticed that the hokuyo gets loaded properly but never generates any messages. It's strange, since the prior test (Sensor_TEST.UpdateAfterReset) had the same laser in the same world and it generated plenty of messages. My guess is that SensorManager is not cleaning up properly after the first test, which causes the second test to fail.
content.html:
I've looked into this a little bit. It appears that the Sensor_TEST.ResetWorldStressTest is failing with or without a Display (see gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-ati build 139).

With some debugging of Sensor_TEST.ResetWorldStressTest, I've noticed that the hokuyo gets loaded properly but never generates any messages. It's strange, since the prior test (Sensor_TEST.UpdateAfterReset) had the same laser in the same world and it generated plenty of messages. My guess is that SensorManager is not cleaning up properly after the first test, which causes the second test to fail.
